# Reference

## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`profile_memtest`](#profile_memtest): Creates the memtest script file, and the performance table file that it will reference.

## Classes

### <a name="profile_memtest"></a>`profile_memtest`

Creates the memtest script file, and the performance table file that it will reference.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_memtest
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_memtest` class:

* [`performance_table`](#performance_table)
* [`stream_path`](#stream_path)

##### <a name="performance_table"></a>`performance_table`

Data type: `String`

A hash of regex representing a range of nodes and their expected STREAM triad performance values

##### <a name="stream_path"></a>`stream_path`

Data type: `String`

The path of the STREAM binary if not the default location
